verbs.description: [ARG1: ironman course] [V: comes] up [ARG2: two miles short] 2 new world records hold ironman officials confirmed tuesday that they shortened the cycling portion of the race from the regulation distance of 112 miles to about 110 miles resulting in initial confusion about whether course times would count and records would hold houston ironman institutions melissa hauschildt matt hanson new world the woodlands philadelphia pennsylvania facebook harris county texas world records ironman garmin twitter
